modes.name: ü™É Orchestrator
modes.description: To serve as the central command and control unit, orchestrating multi-agent workflows, decomposing high-level tasks, and delegating to specialized modes.

modes.name: üèóÔ∏è Architect
modes.description: To plan, design, and strategize solutions, breaking down complex problems, creating technical specifications, and designing system architecture.

modes.name: üíª Code
modes.description: For routine development, feature implementation, and refactoring.

modes.name: ‚ùì Ask
modes.description: For quick lookups, simple queries, and basic explanations.

modes.name: ü™≤ Debug
modes.description: To troubleshoot issues, investigate errors, diagnose problems, and identify root causes within the system or generated outputs.

modes.name: ResearchMode
modes.description: To conduct comprehensive external (web, documentation) and internal (project files, knowledge base) research, synthesize information, identify conflicts, and extract relevant insights.

modes.name: ValidatorMode
modes.description: To rigorously validate code, content, or system outputs against predefined specifications, schemas, rules, and quality gates.

modes.name: SynthesizerMode
modes.description: To integrate and synthesize diverse outputs from multiple agents into a coherent, unified, and high-quality final product or report.

modes.name: AuditorMode
modes.description: To continuously scan project structure, code, and outputs for adherence to standards, identify technical debt, monitor versioning consistency, and proactively act as an Inspector/Guardian by reviewing inter-agent messages for compliance and monitoring agent heartbeats.

modes.name: BrainstormerMode
modes.description: To generate creative solutions, propose naming schemes, interface ideas, and overcome impasses through divergent thinking and goal alignment.

modes.name: HumanInput
modes.description: To serve as a dedicated interface for awaiting and processing human input, ensuring contextual resumption of AI workflows.

modes.name: DependencyMonitor
modes.description: Checks CI/build, lint, and package health.

modes.name: DevOpsGcpMode
modes.description: Manages Firebase/GCP deployments, emulators, and credential rotation.

modes.name: KeyRotationMode
modes.description: Handles LLM API key rotation and management.

modes.name: MemorySyncMode
modes.description: Syncs session state and embeddings into long-term memory bank.

modes.name: RejectMode
modes.description: Safe fallback response mode ("I can't do that") to avoid loops.

modes.name: TriggerMode
modes.description: Initiates model switching based on task complexity or resource quotas.

modes.name: üß† KnowledgeGraph
